extends java.lang.Object
    Minimum Spanning Tree. Kruskal's Algorithm Implementation (thread-safe)

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: parallel optimization library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005

    Company: AIT

    • Method Detail

      • cost

        public double cost()
        Kruskal's algorithm for computing the MST of the graph _g. Uses the DisjointSet data structure for high performance. The method is reentrant.
        Returns:
        double
